languages.text: "Еще как хочу". {n}Соломон испепеляет взглядом префекта.{/n} "Префект Вультур, я уличаю вас в злоупотреблении властью и извращении правосудия Империума. Я был неоднократным свидетелем ваших козней против Вольного Торговца и, что еще более позорно, я был вашим инструментом в них".

"I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."
languages.original_text: "Еще как хочу". {n}Соломон испепеляет взглядом префекта.{/n} "Префект Вультур, я уличаю вас в злоупотреблении властью и извращении правосудия Империума. Я был неоднократным свидетелем ваших козней против Вольного Торговца и, что еще более позорно, я был вашим инструментом в них".

traits.locale_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

"I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

"I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

"I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

"I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

languages.text: "Das werde ich." {n}Solomorne funkelt die Präfektin an.{/n} "Präfektin Vultur, ich beschuldige Euch des Machtmissbrauchs und der Pervertierung der imperialen Justiz. Ich war wiederholt Zeuge Eurer Intrigen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und – was noch schändlicher ist – wurde von Euch instrumentalisiert.
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: "Das werde ich." {n}Solomorne funkelt die Präfektin an.{/n} "Präfektin Vultur, ich beschuldige Euch des Machtmissbrauchs und der Pervertierung der imperialen Justiz. Ich war wiederholt Zeuge Eurer Intrigen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und – was noch schändlicher ist – wurde von Euch instrumentalisiert.

languages.text: « En effet, {n}répond Solomorne en lançant un regard noir à la préfète.{/n} Préfète Vultur, je vous inculpe d'abus de pouvoir et de perversion de la justice de l'Imperium. J'ai été témoin à plusieurs reprises de vos manigances à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et c'est honteusement que j'avoue avoir été votre instrument dans ces machinations. »
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, {n}répond Solomorne en lançant un regard noir à la préfète.{/n} Préfète Vultur, je vous inculpe d'abus de pouvoir et de perversion de la justice de l'Imperium. J'ai été témoin à plusieurs reprises de vos manigances à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et c'est honteusement que j'avoue avoir été votre instrument dans ces machinations. »

languages.text: 「もちろんだ」{n}ソロモーンは総監を鋭くにらみつけた。{/n}「ヴァルター総監、お前を権力の乱用および帝国の正義の歪曲の罪で告発する。俺はお前がローグトレーダーに対して行ってきた数々の企みに、何度も立ち会ってきた。そしてさらに恥ずべきことに、その企みにおいて俺はお前の道具として使われてきたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ」{n}ソロモーンは総監を鋭くにらみつけた。{/n}「ヴァルター総監、お前を権力の乱用および帝国の正義の歪曲の罪で告発する。俺はお前がローグトレーダーに対して行ってきた数々の企みに、何度も立ち会ってきた。そしてさらに恥ずべきことに、その企みにおいて俺はお前の道具として使われてきたのだ」

languages.text: «Desde luego». {n}Solomorne fulmina a la prefecta con la mirada.{/n} «Prefecta Vultur, la acuso de abuso de poder y de pervertir la justicia del Imperium. He sido testigo de sus reiteradas conjuras contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y, para mayor vergüenza, he sido su instrumento durante las mismas».
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego». {n}Solomorne fulmina a la prefecta con la mirada.{/n} «Prefecta Vultur, la acuso de abuso de poder y de pervertir la justicia del Imperium. He sido testigo de sus reiteradas conjuras contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y, para mayor vergüenza, he sido su instrumento durante las mismas».

languages.text: “正是如此。”{n}索罗蒙对行政官怒目而视。{/n}“沃尔图尔行政官，我指控你滥用权力，歪曲帝国的正义。我一而再、再而三地目睹了你针对行商浪人的阴谋，而更可耻的是，我居然还成为了你的帮凶。”
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: “正是如此。”{n}索罗蒙对行政官怒目而视。{/n}“沃尔图尔行政官，我指控你滥用权力，歪曲帝国的正义。我一而再、再而三地目睹了你针对行商浪人的阴谋，而更可耻的是，我居然还成为了你的帮凶。”

languages.text: "Kesinlikle." {n}Solomorne, prefekte ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Prefekt Vultur, seni idari yetkinin kötüye kullanımından ve İmparatorluk'un adaletini yanıltmaktan suçlu buluyorum. Hür Tacir aleyhindeki komplolarına defalarca tanıklık ettim. Daha da vahimi, bu komplolara alet oldum."
languages.original_text: "I certainly do." {n}Solomorne glares at the prefect.{/n} "Prefect Vultur, I charge you with abuse of power and perverting the justice of the Imperium. I have been a repeated witness to your schemes against the Rogue Trader and, even more shamefully, I have been your instrument in them."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle." {n}Solomorne, prefekte ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Valtur Prefekti olarak seni idari yetkinin kötüye kullanımı ve İmparatorluk'un adaletini yanıltma suçlarından hükümlü ilan ediyorum. Hür Tacir aleyhindeki komplolarına defalarca tanıklık ettim ve daha da vahimi bu komplolara alet oldum."
